name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Dedicated Manual QA Engineer with a strong expertise in mobile applications for both iOS and Android platforms, skilled in manual QA testing, API testing using **Postman**, and utilizing bug tracking systems for efficient defect management. Proficient in mobile testing methodologies and mobile app release cycles, experienced with tools such as **Jira**, **TestFlight**, and **Google Play**. Adept at working in agile environments, showcasing exceptional attention to detail, effective communication skills, and proven problem-solving abilities.
Possessing over 13 years of experience as a Full Stack Developer, I have a solid foundation in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with extensive hands-on experience in frontend technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, and **Vue**, along with backend frameworks such as **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Recognized for building AI/ML-powered platforms that enable predictive analytics and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying applications in cloud-native environments on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing robust CI/CD pipelines, and leveraging tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for MLOps.
